what: Read Data from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study (SHCS)
title: Read Data from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study (SHCS)
text: package readshcs provides helper functions read SHCS datasets saved local directory.

title: Read Data from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study (SHCS)
text: can install development version readshcs GitHub :

title: Read Data from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study (SHCS)
code: library(readshcs) # set the directory of the SHCS set_shcs_dir(file.path("path","to","directory"))  # read dataset with patients information (pat.csv) data_pat <- read_shcs_pat()

what: Read datasets from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study — read_shcs
title: Read datasets from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study — read_shcs
text: Read datasets Swiss HIV Cohort Study

title: Read datasets from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study — read_shcs
code: read_shcs_admin(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_center(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_clinical(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_cvrisk(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_dborn(dir, lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_dis(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_med_drug(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_med_drug_code(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_fup(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_hcv(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_hiv_subtype(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_hospital(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_iris(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_lab(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_lab2(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_modif_art(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_mborn(dir, lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_obstet_event(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_pat(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_stop(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_substance_in_prod(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_substance(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_tailor(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_var_cancer(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_var_clinical(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_var_disease(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_var_lab2(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)  read_shcs_var_nation(shcs_dir = get_shcs_dir(), lazy = F, ...)

title: Read datasets from the Swiss HIV Cohort Study — read_shcs
text: shcs_dir chr. Path directory containing SHCS data. lazy lgl. Argument pass read_delim. Default FALSE. ... Argument pass read_delim. dir chr. Path directory.
